sentence.text: Mutations in eight of them (ubiquinone biosynthetic process, ubiquinone biosynthetic process, ubiquinone biosynthetic process, ubiquinone biosynthetic process, ubiquinone biosynthetic process, ADCK3, ADCK4, and ubiquinone biosynthetic process) cause primary CoQ(10) deficiency, a heterogeneous group of disorders with variable age of onset (from birth to the seventh decade) and associated clinical phenotypes, ranging from a fatal multisystem disease to isolated steroid resistant nephrotic syndrome (SRNS) or isolated central nervous system disease.
In primary forms treatment can lysosome localization the progression of both SRNS and encephalopathy, hence the critical importance of a prompt diagnosis.
